thread.section_title: The Connaught - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Unforgettable
thread.title_full: Unforgettable - Review of The Connaught, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Panos S
title: Unforgettable
text:
Old school hotel. Coming from the States it was great to see so much service. Service level was truly excellent. If you need any advice, Ben at the concierge desk will give you advice on the good play to go visit, the right tourist attractions and in our cases what restaurants to visit.
The front desk was as helpful, food was phenomenal. The decor is extremely tasteful, stairwell is fantastic.
Truly excellent housekeeping service. We didn't eat much at the hotel but we had a couple of breakfasts and they didn't disappoint.
Location is perfect, walking distance to a tremendous amount of spots.
Would love to go Back.
